# PromptPex

## Documentation Sets

- [Abridged documentation](https://microsoft.github.io/promptpex/llms-small.txt): a compact version of the documentation for PromptPex, with non-essential content removed
- [Complete documentation](https://microsoft.github.io/promptpex/llms-full.txt): the full documentation for PromptPex

## Notes

- The complete documentation includes all content from the official documentation
- The content is automatically generated from the same source as the official documentation
